post: Trump is toast. He and Brendan Carr spiked this Colbert interview. (TY, I wouldn't have seen this if you hadn't.) Buckle up. People often complain about The System, but The System knows best... The system is Optimal. Inputs, limited as they are, do not register the documented necessity of upward reallocation and the requirement to off-board non-performing units. #poetry stygian-muse.com/compliance-i...
